name: node-hperformance
readme:
# node-hperformance [![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url] [![Build Status][travis-image]][travis-url] [![Dependency Status][daviddm-image]][daviddm-url]
> High-performance libraries for node.

This module implements the most typical methods of lapack library across of bridge offered to C. So, 
if you want to use this module you need to have it installed.

### on Ubuntu (Maybe you need to install something else)
```sh
 sudo apt-get install liblapack-dev
```


## Install

```sh
$ npm install --save node-hperformance
```


## Usage

```js
var lapack = require('node-hperformance').lapack;

lapack.dgesv(A, b);
lapack.dgels(trans, A, b);
lapack.dgelqf(A);
lapack.dgesvd(A);

lapack.dgesv_(n, nrhs, lda, ldb, A, b);
lapack.dgels_(trans, m, n, nrhs, lda, ldb, lwork, A, b);
lapack.dgelqf_(m, n, A, lda, ltau, lwork);
lapack.dgesvd_(m, n, A, lda, ldu, ldvt);

```
